vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.34;
son of: Shomer (H7763H);
brother of: Ahi (H0277H), Rohgah (H7303) and Aram (H0758J)
§ Jehubbah = "hidden"
a man of Asher, son of Shomer or Shamer of the house of Beriah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Sémer; tribu de Aser
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶戶巴 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "隱藏"
亞設人, 朔默的兒子 (代上 7:34)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶户巴 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "隐藏"
亚设人, 朔默的儿子 (代上 7:34)
